ogImageAlt: Supernova HDR PNG converter interface preview

routes.title: HDR PNG Converter: Convert Images to HDR PNG | Supernova
routes.description: Convert image files to HDR PNG in your browser with PQ (ST 2084) and Rec.2020 metadata. Upload PNG, JPEG, WebP, or AVIF and download instantly.

routes.title: How HDR PNG Conversion Works | Supernova
routes.description: Learn how this HDR PNG converter uses live SDR preview, look controls, PQ transfer, Rec.2020 color, and cICP/cHRM/iCCP metadata to produce HDR-ready PNG files.

routes.title: JPEG to HDR PNG Converter (Free, In Browser) | Supernova
routes.description: Convert JPEG photos to HDR PNG in your browser with PQ and Rec.2020 metadata. Keep local processing, tune look controls, and download instantly.

routes.title: WebP to HDR PNG Converter (Fast Local Export) | Supernova
routes.description: Turn WebP images into HDR PNG files with PQ transfer and Rec.2020 metadata. Adjust saturation and advanced controls, then export in your browser.

routes.title: AVIF to HDR PNG Converter With PQ Metadata | Supernova
routes.description: Convert AVIF images to HDR PNG without uploading. Supernova processes locally and outputs 16-bit PQ BT.2020 PNG for compatible HDR displays.

routes.title: HDR PNG Browser Compatibility Guide | Supernova
routes.description: See HDR PNG support across Chrome, Edge, Safari, and Firefox, and learn how PQ, cICP, cHRM, and iCCP metadata affect rendering.

routes.title: Page Not Found | Supernova HDR PNG Converter
routes.description: This page could not be found. Return to the Supernova HDR PNG converter.
